Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:@/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Protocol.description: Configuration settings for an NFS or SMB protocol, currently only support NFS

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

NFS.description: FSx OpenZFS file system NFS protocol information
NFS.markdownDescription:
FSx OpenZFS file system NFS protocol information

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

MountOptions.description: The NFS mount options that DataSync can use to mount your NFS share.

Version.description: The specific NFS version that you want DataSync to use to mount your NFS share.
Version.markdownDescription:
The specific NFS version that you want DataSync to use to mount your NFS share.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: AUTOMATIC | NFS3 | NFS4_0 | NFS4_1  
Update requires: No interruption

MountOptions.markdownDescription:
The NFS mount options that DataSync can use to mount your NFS share.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

FsxFilesystemArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the FSx OpenZFS file system.
FsxFilesystemArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the FSx OpenZFS file system.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):fsx:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:file-system/fs-[0-9a-f]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

SecurityGroupArns.description: The ARNs of the security groups that are to use to configure the FSx OpenZFS file system.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):ec2:[a-z\-0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:security-group/sg-[a-f0-9]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

SecurityGroupArns.markdownDescription:
The ARNs of the security groups that are to use to configure the FSx OpenZFS file system.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Replacement

Subdirectory.description: A subdirectory in the location's path.
Subdirectory.markdownDescription:
A subdirectory in the location's path.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 4096  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_\-\+\./\(\)\$\p{Zs}]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

LocationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon FSx OpenZFS file system location that is created.
LocationArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon FSx OpenZFS file system location that is created.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):datasync:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:location/loc-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

LocationUri.description: The URL of the FSx OpenZFS that was described.
LocationUri.markdownDescription:
The URL of the FSx OpenZFS that was described.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 4356  
Pattern: ^(efs|nfs|s3|smb|fsxw|hdfs|fsxl|fsxz)://[a-zA-Z0-9.:/\-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
